name: "Celebrity Mole" in the Yucatan Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: What was the saying on Dennis Rodman's shirt during the Tequila Shooters game?
questions.explanation:
Surf Naked.

	He was wearing a white tee shirt with the phrase "surf naked" in black letters.

questions.text: How many tequila bottles did Mark Curry successfully bring across the bridge to Ahmad?
questions.explanation:
0.

	He did not bring any over.  Making everyone more suspicious that he could possibly be the mole.

questions.text: At the end of the Tequila Shooters game, how much money was in the pot?
questions.explanation:
$105,000.

	They won a total of $12,000 in this game bring the pot up to $105,000.

questions.text: How many worms did Dennis Rodman eat for the team to double their winnings from the Tequila Shooters game?
questions.explanation:
4.

	He ate his worm and Tracey's, Angie's, and Keshia's worms as well.  He said he didn't mind it because he was used to eating snake in China.

questions.text: During the third episode, did Mark Curry gain an exemption by eating everyone's leftovers at dinner?
questions.explanation:
No.

	He came so close but couldn't get the last two bites down in the time allowed.  He said he knew what it must feel like to be pregnant.

questions.text: In the beginning episode, which two celebrities did not get picked up in the Taxi Game?
questions.explanation:
Tracey and Keshia.

	Corbin was the driver of the taxi and he had to find his way around the town and pick up each celebrity and bring them back to the designated location in order to put money in the pot.  They ran out of time and didn't pick up Tracey and Keshia.

questions.text: Who was the second celebrity to be executed?
questions.explanation:
Corbin.

	Corbin was executed in the third episode of "Celebrity Mole" that was held in Hawaii.  He got out of this game quicker.  He said on his walk to shame that he didn't think he would be back for a third time.  We will have to see.

questions.text: In the Still Life game, how long did the players have to get Ahmad's picture in the gallery?
questions.explanation:
30 minutes.

	Tracey, Keshia, and Angie had to draw three separate pictures and then Dennis had to try to match them to the correct painting in the gallery.  If they were successful at this they would have added $20,000 to the pot.

questions.text: In the fourth episode, was there an opportunity to gain an exemption?
questions.explanation:
No.

	They were no opportunities during this episode for any of the celebrities to gain an exemption, which meant they were all open for execution.

questions.text: Who was the fourth celebrity to get executed in the game?
questions.explanation:
Keshia.

	Keshia became the mole's fourth victim of the game.  She is also the youngest player at 21 in this installment of "Celebrity Mole".
